publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2606.2 Ms Wendy Alexander: Scotland's Railways-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2606) in the name of Mr Kenny MacAskill, leave out from first "notes" to end and insert "welcomes the publication of the Strategic Rail Authority's Strategic Plan and the vision it contains as a first, significant step towards a bigger, better and safer railway for Scotland." Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*
